desc: 攻撃力を３０％アップ＆スパークダメージを５０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A jewel named after a region of Ishgria. With its constant snow cover and brutal climate, Estria is rarely involved in territorial conflicts, and retains beautiful scenery. However, it is said that the region houses immense energy reserves underground. Furthermore, rumors hold that a certain demon keeps a jewel containing a compressed form of that energy locked away somewhere.

name: 魔封珠『エストリア』

usage.name: 託閃煌鏡フォリフォリ
